title: Himi 443
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Na’e ai ha vaka na’e folau
He Tahi Kāleli;
Nau fusi pe ‘a e lā ke a’u,
He langi na’e lelei.
2.
Kae fokifā na’e hifo mai
Ha taufa kehe ang
e
;
Na’e ngaueue ai ‘a e tah
i
,
‘O fu’u pupula hak
e
.
3.
Na’e ilifia ‘a e kau folau,
‘O tō honau manav
a
,
‘Enau mamata he peau,
He ngoto honau vak
a
.
4.
Ku
o
toka pē ‘a e ‘Eikivak
a
,
He kuo ongosia.
Nau ‘amanaki te ne ‘ā,
Kae mohe ma’u pē ia.
5.
Nau hanga ‘o fafangu pē,
“Eiki tokoni mai!
Ko
e
vaka ‘oku fonu ē,
‘Oku tau tu’utāmak
i
!”
6.
Ne ‘ā pe leva ‘enau tang
i
,
Ne hanga pē ‘o tu’u,
Ne folofola ki he tah
i
,
“’Oua ‘e momo’i ngū!”
7.
Ne ongo hifo ki he tahi
‘A e l
e
a ‘a hono Hau,
Ne mate leva ‘a e matang
i
,
Malona ‘a e peau.
8.
‘Oku kei fai folau ‘a e ‘Eik
i
Mo si’ono kakai;
Pea mo’ua he havil
i
‘A e vaka
‘o e
Sias
i
.
9.
‘Ē, ‘oua na’a tau lotosi’i;
‘Oku ‘i vaka pē.
Ke fa’iteliha pē ‘a e ‘Eik
i
Pe te ne ‘ā ‘afē.
10.
Ko ia ai pē ha peau,
Ha taufa fu’u mamaf
a
;
‘E ‘ikai ngoto ha folau
Ka ‘oku Ne ‘i vak
a
.*
